title: Recall Notification Report 054-2018 (Ham Products)
summary: WASHINGTON, June 25, 2018 Land O'Frost, Inc., a Madisonville, Ky. establishment, is recalling approximately 4,944 pounds of ham products due to misbranding, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The front of the package is accurately labeled as Black...
